name: 24hrs in Lufthansa 747 FIRST CLASS (South Africa to USA)
description:
Watch this video to see what it’s like to fly in FIRST CLASS on the QUEEN OF THE SKIES, the Boeing 747!

Lufthansa FIRST CLASS on the 747 is a special experience. In fact, a lot of people say it's a must-have experience for Aviation Enthusiasts! So welcome to LufthansaFirst Class on the 747! 

We’re about to spend 24 hours experiencing the ultimate luxury in the sky as we travel from Johannesburg all the way to Chicago via Frankfurt on two Lufthansa 747-8’s, and you’re along for the trip of a lifetime along this unbelievable journey. 

In this video, we’ll showcase Lufthansa First Class and all you can experience on the longest flight they currently offer with this service. 

At a whopping 24 hours, this is one of the most extreme experiences you could expect to have in First Class anywhere! 

You’ll see the unbelievable First Class Terminal, a completely separate building for a special lounge reserved for Lufthansa’s most exclusive passengers. We’ll also show you the unspeakably incredible seats! You’ll also experience some decadent food onboard as we experience special First Class meals over this trip! Naturally, you’ll see the First Class inflight entertainment, too. 

In short, this was a very special aviation experience we can’t wait to share with you! 

Can you guess the JebScore? Stick around to the end to find out if you’re right about this First Class Lufthansa experience!
